title: Extant
plot_outline: An astronaut struggles to learn how she became pregnant while on a 13-month-long solo space mission.
keywords: [u'space', u'astronaut', u'future', u'one-word-series-title']
taglines: [u'Life always finds a way']
trivia: [u'The word "extant" is an adjective, meaning in existence, or still existing.', u'On October 9, 2014, it was renewed by CBS for a second season, along with Under The Dome (2013).', u'Jeffrey Dean Morgan and David Morrissey play villains in The Walking Dead (2010).', u'This show has a few connections to One Tree Hill (2003): Pierce Gagnon (Ethan) appeared in seven episodes in season nine, Tyler Hilton (Charlie) appeared in 29 episodes in seasons two, three, four, and nine; and Jeffrey Dean Morgan (J.D.) is married to former One Tree Hill (2003) star Hilarie Burton, who also appears in season two episodes of this show.', u"Jeffrey Dean Morgan plays a character named J.D. Richter. J and D are the initials of the actor's name.", u"Necar Zadegan, starred alongside Mami Gummer (Grace Gummer's sister) in Emily Owens, M.D. (2012).", u"Michael O'Neill and Enver Gjokaj had recurring roles on Vegas (2012)."]

title: Falling Skies
plot_outline: Survivors of an alien attack on earth gather together to fight for their lives and fight back.
keywords: [u'alien', u'post-apocalypse', u'military', u'father-son-relationship', u'alien-invasion', u'dystopian-future', u'professor']
taglines: [u"We're not just fighting for our lives. We're fighting for our existence.", u'Battle them or become them.']
trivia: [u'The name of the main band of survivors shown in the series, the 2nd Massachusetts, is taken from a real regiment of soldiers that fought in both the American Revolution and the Civil War.', u'The screeching sound of the skitters when they run is the same sound effect used for the raptors in The Jurassic Park films.', u'Cochise, the name Tom uses for his Volm ally, is the name of a notable Apache leader.', u"Noah Wyle plays Drew Roy's father even though he is only 15 years older than him.", u"Noah Wyle's character in both E.R. and Falling Skies interacts with another lead character having the last name of Weaver. Dr. Kerry Weaver from E.R. and Captain Weaver in Falling Skies.", u'Season 5 is the final season of the series']
release_dates: [u'USA::19 June 2011', u'Germany::24 June 2011 (limited)', u'UK::5 July 2011', u'Italy::5 July 2011', u'Australia::7 July 2011', u'Sweden::24 August 2011', u'Germany::21 November 2011', u'Japan::14 April 2012', u'Finland::3 January 2013', u'Netherlands::25 May 2013 (Amsterdam Series Weekend)', u'Hungary::6 June 2013']

title: The Whispers
plot_outline: An unseen force is manipulating society's most innocent-our children-to act in favor of its cause. As the kids unwittingly help this unknown enemy, the clock counts down in this suspenseful race to save humanity.
keywords: [u'based-on-short-story', u'remake', u'investigation', u'female-special-agent', u'murder', u'invisible-friend', u'alien-signal', u'little-girl', u'naivete', u'cancellation', u'manipulation', u'deception', u'alien-invasion']
taglines: [u'Not all imaginary friends are imaginary.', u'Did you ever have an imaginary friend?']
trivia: [u'Originally was titled "The Visitors" but before ABC picked the show up to series they requested the title be changed due to the similarities in another show that aired on ABC called "V" which stands for visitors. When ABC picked the show up to series the title was announced as "The Whispers".', u'While uncredited, the series is based on the short story "Zero Hour" by Ray Bradbury which was first published in the Fall 1947 issue of "Planet Stories" and later collected in Bradbury\'s 1951 anthology "The Illustrated Man". Dawn Parouse read the short story and brought it to Amblin TV which developed it with Soo Hugh.', u'Brianna Brown played Lena in the unaired pilot but subsequently exited the show due to what TVLine reported as creative reasons. She was replaced by Kristen Connolly.', u"Lily Rabe's first leading role in a television series.", u'Season 2 of "The Whispers" was up in the air for a long while. Not knowing if a season 2 would happen, the writers made an ending to season 1 that provides a conclusion, but leaves it open for another season if it were to happen. This show has since been cancelled.', u'Gary Hershberger played the role of President Winters in the unaired pilot but was replaced by Martin Cummins for the series.', u'The unaired pilot was filmed in Los Angeles but production for the series was moved to Vancouver. As reported in Deadline, several members of the cast were unhappy with the relocation.']
release_dates: [u'USA::1 June 2015', u'Belgium::15 June 2015 (limited)', u'Netherlands::15 June 2015 (limited)', u'Hungary::20 July 2015', u'Japan::16 April 2016']
